defmodule Solution do
  @spec max_sum(nums :: [integer], m :: integer, k :: integer) :: integer
  def max_sum(nums, m, k) do
    nums
    |> Enum.chunk_every(k, 1, :discard)
    |> Enum.filter(fn chunk -> Enum.uniq(chunk) |> length() >= m end)
    |> Enum.map(&Enum.sum/1)
    |> Enum.max()
    |> case do
      nil -> 0
      max_sum -> max_sum
    end
  end
end
